page.title: 09Colerne Primary School
page.content: This school is for children from the age of five to eleven years. There is one main building and four mobile classrooms, the school is lucky in having spacious grounds and pleasant views. The school used to be housed in a Victorian building near the church which was used for extra classes until 1979. A group of children talked to some elderly people about school life in the nineteen twenties. In general school was much stricter, the lessons were repetitive and left little room for individual creativity. These days there are more oppurtunities to investigate interesting topics and visit interesting places as a result of which the school day is often more enjoyable.
